title: These are the 15 richest people in the US
text:
New York | The CEO of Amazon, Jeff Bezos, remains the richest person in America despite parting with $US46 billion ($68 billion) over the past year, according to Forbes' latest ranking of the most wealthy people in the US

On Wednesday, the financial magazine dropped its 38th annual Forbes 400 list, and the billionaires who made the 2019 line up have a combined net worth of $US2.96 trillion, Forbes said. Behind Bezos, who's worth an estimated $US114 billion, was Microsoft entrepreneur Bill Gates, whose worth is an estimated $US106 billion.

MacKenzie Bezos came in at No.15.

Warren Buffet is the third-richest person in the US with $US80.8 billion.

"A record 221 US billionaires did not make the cut this year, falling short of the $US2.1 billion minimum needed to make the list," Forbes reports. Over half of the people in the lineup are self-made billionaires and founders of their companies.

Other notable rankings include Donald Trump, whose position dropped from No. 259 in 2018 to 275 this year, even though his net worth remained the same at $US3.1 billion. Amazon's CEO transferred a quarter of his shares to his now ex-wife, MacKenzie Bezos, who rang in at No. 15 with a net worth of $US36 billion.
description: The billionaires who made the Forbes 400 2019 line up have a combined net worth of $US2.96 trillion.
